description: The Kids Company is thrilled to present a unique workshop tailored for kids in the age group of 4-8 years where they'll embark on a journey to ignite their creativity, imagination, communication, and spatial reasoning skills with the endless possibilities of Lego!What's in store:In this action-packed 5-day workshop, children will explore five different world destinations, all from the comfort of our workshop space! Each day will bring new adventures and discoveries as we delve into 5 diverse destinations! Our young Lego builders will jump-start each day with a Creative Lego building session, where they will construct iconic landmarks and scenes representing our daily destination. Their imaginations will soar as they will bring these places to life brick by brick!Where: The Kids Company®, JuhuWhen: May & June 2024 (Weekly workshops)Week 1: 27-31 May 2024 (Mon-Fri)Week 2: 3-7 June 2024 (Mon-Fri)Week 3: 10-14 June 2024 (Mon-Fri)Age group: 4 - 8 yearsJuniors: 4 - 5.5 yearsSeniors: 6 - 8 yearsSmall batch size: Maximum 8 kids per batchOur Lego workshops are conceptualized, designed and executed by Dhara Mehta, a certified LEGO educator who shall be taking the kids on a journey to explore their imagination and creativity using LEGO bricks. She has more than a decade of experience in this space and is a passionate Lego builder herself. Through her program she has reached out to Lego builders not only from India but from overseas too!Sign up your budding Lego Builder in The Kids Company's Lego Summer Workshop to engage them in some open ended creativity and exploration as they polish their spatial and reasoning skills too!Visit our website www.thekidscompany.in or call us at +91 9819119835 for more details. You can also follow us on Facebook and Instagram @thekidscompany.in for updates and pictures of our sessions.Happy Building!

description: A self-exploration workshop for anyone looking to find moments of deep listening & stillness, away from the hyper-stimulating surroundings that we’re a part of every day.During our time together, we will work towards meaningfully connecting with ourselves and each other.We’ll listen to music, move our bodies, express ourselves through art, and, most importantly, breathe with intention. We’ll let our breath guide us and come home to ourselves, no matter what that looks or feels like in the current moment.Venue: One Design Studio, Bandra West, MumbaiDate & time: 6th July, 10:30 AM to 5:30 PM (lunch will be provided)Breathing modality: Conscious Connected Rapid BreathingNumber of seats: Intimate group of 12 peopleBreathwork Practitioner: Madhura AriaAbout the Breathing Technique:Conscious connected rapid breathing is a breathwork technique that involves continuous, deep breathing without pauses between inhales and exhales, facilitating a heightened state of awareness and emotional release. This practice can be useful for reducing stress, promoting mental clarity, and accessing deep-seated emotions for healing and personal growth.If you have any questions, Whatsapp 9535860973.
location: VenueOne Design Studio76 Pali Hill, Nargis Dutt Rd, Bandra West, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400050, India

description: Ghajini is a 2005 Indian Tamil-language action thriller film directed by A. R. Murugadoss and produced by Salem Chandrasekharan. The film stars Suriya and Asin in the lead with Pradeep Rawat as the main antagonist, along with Nayanthara and Riyaz Khan in the supporting roles. Harris Jayaraj composed the soundtrack and background music, while R. D. Rajasekhar and Anthony were the film`s cinematographer and editor, respectively. In the film, Sanjay Ramaswamy (Suriya), once an eminent businessman, develops anterograde amnesia due to a head injury he sustains while attempting to save his fiancee Kalpana (Asin) from getting murdered by a gangster (Pradeep Rawat). After that, he sets out to avenge her murder with the aid of photographs from a Polaroid Instant camera and permanent tattoos on his body.About Venue: LAKE VIEW OPEN AIR THEATER  Promoted by Marlen MahalFor Queries call / watsup 7826060607

description: MUMBAI MIDNIGHT CYCLING | NIGHT CYCLING IN MUMBAIGet ready for a thrilling adventure as we present our Midnight Cycling Event in Colaba. Experience the Night life of Mumbai's in a unique and exhilarating way. Feel the cool breeze and gentle drizzle as we navigate through the illuminated lanes witnessing the city's vibrant nightlife from a whole new perspective. This event is perfect for cycling enthusiasts of all levels from beginners to seasoned riders. So grab your bike gear up and join us for an unforgettable Mumbai Midnight Cycling Event in Colaba. Let's pedal into the night create lasting memories and experience the magic of Mumbai's in a truly unique way. Mumbai is the city that never sleeps the city that makes you feel safe at night and the city that makes every dream come alive. The nighttime Mumbai is truly a sight to behold. Ride from Colaba along the Marine Drive mesmerizing queen`s necklace all the way to Gateway of India. The route is planned for you to check out various heritage sites. We will be taking small breaks and will take time to stop by and experience the nightlife of Mumbai. If you like a non-crowded experience Mischief Treks is the best-suited Team for considering any outdoor activity/events.Event Details Link:  https://www.mischieftreks.com/cyclingVenue: Colaba Mumbai.Category: Weekend getaway. Easy cycle ride suitable for beginners.Duration: 5 hoursDistance: 22 kmCycling Route: Colaba Marine Drive Girgaon Chowpatty Hanging Garden CSMT Flora Fountain Asiatic Library Gateway of India Taj HotelBatch Size: 30 Participants only(We do not take 70-80 people for the cycling event it`s against our safety policy.)What does the Ticket Include?Without Rented Cycle Ticket: Charges exclude rented cycles. Participants need to bring their own Cycle Helmet. It includes Refreshment and a lot of fun too.With Rented Cycle Ticket: Charges include Cycle rent and Refreshment and a lot of fun.HIGHLIGHTSWhat makes this event specialThrill and adventure of riding the streets of Mumbai at Midnight.Experienced Lead-Rider to help you throughout the night. Cycle available on rent. Meet and gel with like-minded people.Explore the actual Mumbai Crowd free at night.Cycle route specially formulated for best experience.Witness the real nightlife of Mumbai streets. Points covered : Colaba Marine Drive Girgaon Chowpatty Hanging Garden CSMT Flora Fountain Kala Ghoda Asiatic Library Gateway of India Taj HotelMumbai Midnight Cycling Timeline:Meeting Point: Colaba Market Mumbai.Reporting Time: 10:45 pm.Note: Exact map GPS location will be shared with you on WhatsApp Group which will be formed 3 hours prior to the event date and time.We'll be meeting you at the GPS location shared in group you need to reach there by sharp 10:45 pm. Once the clock hits 10:59 pm we will move out from meeting point.After a short Safety and Introduction round we would gear up collect our cycles and start Cycling on a pre marked route.We'll be taking breaks and stopping at all the points to spend good time at the location click pictures and have loads of fun.We'll be then having our Introduction round at Hanging Garden you can have your refreshment break and munch on something to recharge your energy levels.By 04:00 am we'll be reaching back to our starting point hand over cycles and riding gear and the ride ends with memories. You can opt to go to Marines or Girgaon Chowpatty or Head Back home. Points Covered during night cycling:ColabaMarine DriveGirgaon ChowpattyHanging GardenCSMTFlora FountainAsiatic LibraryGateway of IndiaTaj HotelNote : We will be creating WhatsApp group at 7pm on event date for coordination purposesINCLUSIONS/EXCLUSIONSInclusions of night cycling event:Gear/Non-Gear cycles (as per ticket opted)Biscuit and Juice Tetra Pack.Expertise and administration charges.Basic First Aid Exclusions:Any personal expenses.Cost incurred to carry cycle in taxi in case of issues during the ride.Anything not specifically mentioned above.Things you need to carry for Night Cycling:Identity Proof (Mandatory)Helmet (For participants who have their own cycles)Riding gear and accessories (optional)Water Bottle 1 Ltr (Mandatory)Medicines that you might require (We do carry a general First Aid kit)Chocolates or candy or things to munch on. You need to keep your tummy happy.A Sling bag or backpack to carry your stuff (Mandatory)Raincoat/Windcheater (Umbrellas won't work)IMPORTANT NOTE: Once you book your tickets from Insider please connect with us on WhatsApp Chat on 7719800777. After you make payment and send us participant details KYC details form link will be shared with you on whatsapp it needs to be submitted within 24 hours of your booking. You need to submit accurate correct and authentic details while registering. Your name phone email needs to be your own. Without this authentic info you will "Not" be allowed to participate in the event and no refunds will be provided in such case.Important NoteIMPORTANT NOTE REGARDING CYCLING EVENT: After you make payment and send us participant details KYC details form link will be shared with you on whatsapp it needs to be submitted immediately to avoid any inconvenience. The details need to be shared with us atleast 48 hours prior to event date and time. You need to submit accurate correct and authentic details while registering. Your name phone email needs to be your own. Without this authentic info you will "Not" be allowed to participate in the event and no refunds will be provided in such case.Please do not book this event if you are not physically fit to complete the event OR you do not have a sportsmanship spirit OR you haven't read and understood the details FAQ and terms mentioned on this page. Outdoor activities are based on teamwork and by registering for this event you will be part of a team. We haven't hired any slaves/servants to cater to anyone this is an outdoor sports event wherein every participant is responsible for his/her place in the team. We do not welcome latecomers so please report on time.Night Cycling | FAQ'S about Midnight Cycling in Mumbai Q. How do I get all the details about the Tour like charges meeting time pickup time and location inclusion exclusion things to carry etc? Can someone read it out for me on phone?Ans. All the details are mentioned on this page itself once you scroll up you will have all info on your screen. Sorry we do not verbally provide the same details on the phone as it usually creates a lot of misunderstanding and miscommunication. Also it's extremely important to "Read and Understand" all the details before you book the event so that you have absolute clarity. If something mentioned on this page is confusing you can get clarity on chat by clicking on the "WhatsApp Chat" button on this page. To discuss things that are not mentioned on this website we can arrange a callback from one of our trek leaders.Q. I have booked/paid for the event is my booking confirmed for the event? Ans. No ! your booking can become invalid if you do not submit the "Most Important Details" required for emergency situations. You are required to submit these details immediately to avoid any inconvenience. Submitting incomplete/incorrect/fake details in the form or not submitting the KYC form will make your booking invalid and no refund will be provided in such case. We do not allow anyone to participate in the event until we have complete and authentic details of the person. This info is crucial in case of an emergency and is a mandatory KYC parameter. The link for the "personal details KYC form" will be sent on WhatsApp after you complete the booking instructions mentioned on the website. Q. Why is submitting emergency contact details and KYC information mandatory?Ans. Its a standard protocol and also a guideline by Govt of India. We are accountable for every "Human-Body" present at our event. Each person is our responsibility and in case of any unfortunate event we will be asked by authorities to provide all relevant information about you. In order to comply with the authorities we need authentic information from you. Fake/Incomplete information or non-submission of the details will make your registration (paid amount) invalid and no refund will be provided in such case. You will not be allowed to participate in the event. Q. Does the cancellation policy/rescheduling policy apply to me if I book on event day or last day? Ans: Yes the policy is applicable irrespective of the booking date. The cancellation / reschedule policy is applicable to everyone with immediate effect from the date and time of booking. The refunds/rescheduling requests will be processed based on the date and time of cancellation/reschedule request sent to us and the date and time of booking the event are irrelevant. Q. What is the basis of cancellation/reschedule policy in case of medical or personal emergency of participant or organizing team? Ans: The cancellation policy is based on fairness towards the participant and the organizing team. In case of medical/personal emergency the loss arising out of cancellation/reschedule will be borne by the respective person. i.e. if the organizing team faces an emergency situation and the event gets canceled the participant will not have to suffer financial loss. Similarly if the participant faces an emergency situation the organizing team will not have to suffer financial loss. The cancellation policy is designed with a completely unbiased approach towards the participant and organizing team and is aimed at fairness towards both. Q. What is the minimum age for participating in night cycling? Ans: All participants need to be 18 years and above. Those below 18 need to get an adult along with them or get a consent letter from parents. You need to keep up with the rest of the group. Q. What if the cycle breaks down or gets punctured?Ans: In case of cycle breakdown or puncture you need to hire a taxi and get a replacement from starting point of the cycling event. The cost of transport is to be borne by the participant. Mischief Treks does not rent cycles We help you get a rented cycle and the rent paid by you gets passed on to the cycle vendor. in case of any issues with the cycle you are required to get in touch with the vendor.Q. Can I pay in cash on the spot for midnight cycling? Ans: No you have to book well in advance before seats get sold out and payment has to be made online. Cash payments are not accepted. Its Mandatory to make online payments using any payment app or net banking via UPI / NEFT / QR Code.Q. Can I book unconfirmed slot on the same day the night cycling event is scheduled? Ans: Generally the event gets sold out 2-3 days in advance. Once the 30 tickets are sold booking process stops. You are free to book as long as the slots are available. If slots are not available you still can choose to make a payment and wait for 24 hours for confirmation on your unconfirmed booking. Within 24 hours we will provide you a confirmation in case we are able to adjust slots for you. Beware this option is not recommended as it carries uncertainty. This option needs to be exercised only if you desperately want to participate and you have failed to book well in advance. During the waiting period of unconfirmed bookings the cancellation policy shall apply and a cancellation/rescheduling request will be processed as per cancellation policy mentioned on this event details page. Q. How do I book my ticket for the cycling event? Ans: If you wish to participate in the cycling event in Mumbai You need to logon to www.mischieftreks.com and select the cycling event of your choice and click on Book-Now button. The registration process and payment process for Night cycling event is secured by reliable payment processing system.Q. What happens if the cycle gets punctured or suffers a breaks down? Ans: You shall be provided a replacement cycle at the starting point. You need to get a taxi to starting point and submit the punctured cycle to get a replacement. Once you have the replacement cycle you can use the same taxi to reach back to the group. Q. How many people will be at the night cycling event? Ans. The participant count for night cycling depends on the number of people booking the event. Generally the batch size is approximately 20-30 participants. Mischief Treks does not believe in overcrowding the batch as its against the safety protocol. Q. How many kilometers do we ride during the night cycling event? Ans. The total distance covered during the night cycling event is approximately 18-20 km. The entire cycling track has multiple halt points and sufficient breaks are taken during the event to ensure comfort levels. Q. What kind of cycles are used for the night cycling event? geared or non geared cycles? Ans. We have both options available geared cycles and non geared cycles on rent. But If you are not experienced enough to handle geared cycle we would advise you to opt for non-geared ones.Q. How can I get cycles on rent for the night cycling event? Ans. We do have the rented cycle option available. You need to log on to www.mischieftreks.com and wile registering yourself for the night cycling event you need to select the relevant option for rented cycle. You don't need to have your own cycle we can arrange those for you.Q. Is Midnight Cycling safe for solo participants? Ans. Yes mostly 30% of participants come up solo and blend in. It is safe to participate in the midnight cycling event. Apart from standard risks of any outing or sport event no additional risks are involved. Mischief Treks crew will be there with the group all the time. Q. Is Midnight Cycling in Mumbai safe for girls/women? Ans. Apart from standard risks involved in any outdoor activity no additional risks are involved. Mischief Treks has a track record of making our events extremely safe for females and especially males. Normally 60-75 percent of our participants are females.Q. Can I request customised refreshments for cycling event? Ans. Yes you can request customised refreshments anything that is available on the zomato app can be opted for. Additional handling charges of 300 per order would be applicable in addition to the zomato app order value. Q. Can I quit in the middle of the night cycling event? Ans. If you have your own cycle you can quit whenever you want to. But if you rent the cycle you need to pay for safely transporting rented cycle back to Colaba via a taxi also you need to handover the cycle to designated person at the starting point and then you can leave.Q. What if I dont reach the meeting point before reporting time 10.50pm? Ans. If you do not report at the meeting point till 10.50pm you will be considered dropout and the group will proceed as per the schedule. Its extremely important to be punctual we will not be able to keep entire batch of punctual people standing on road for someone who did not respect time. All coordination will be done in the Whatsapp group which will be created approximately 3hours prior to event date and time. No phone calls will be made to inform the same. No refund will be provided in case of drop-outs. Q. How can I ride a Cycle safely at night? Ans: You should ride the cycle where you can be easily seen. Always wear reflective safety jackets these jackets help other drivers to notice you as these jackets reflect when the light falls on them in the dark. Always wear a helmet to avoid any fatal damage to your head in case of an accident and ride with caution.Q. What is provided as refreshment at the Cycling event? Ans: You will be provided a tetra pack of juice or drink along with a bakery item like cake or biscuits during the night cycling event.  Q. What is the best Energy food for Cycling? Ans: You can try these 5 Energy Foods for high Endurance Cycling. Bananas are well-loved by most endurance athletes. Nuts and Seeds Almonds chia seeds pistachios Dried Fruits. Studies have shown that certain dried fruits like raisins and dates can improve endurance-related performance substantially. You can even carry Electrolyte Infused Water i.e. ORS.Q. What should I drink after cycling?Ans: Hydration is the key staying hydrated while cycling and post cycling is also vital. If the ride was easy and under 90 minutes sipping a 500ml bottle of water or electrolyte drink should be sufficient to rehydrate. But if it was a long or intense session aim to replace 100-150% of the fluid lost through sweat within one to four hours of hopping off your bike.Q. Why do I feel hungry after cycling? Ans: Cycling burns your calories Burning calories through exercise disrupts the balance between caloric intake and caloric burn by increasing caloric burn. One way in which the body responds is by increasing the level of acylated ghrelin in the bloodstream. This makes you feel hungry.Q. Is it safe to ride a cycle in Mumbai?Ans: Cycling in Mumbai is quite safe during early mornings and late nights. There are a lot of cityscape views that you could enjoy on a cycle. Mumbai is also known as the city that never sleeps you can join us for Midnight cycling every Saturday.Q. Is night cycling allowed in Mumbai?Ans: Yes Cycling is allowed in Mumbai during the nighttime. Mischief Treks arranges night Cycling / Midnight every Saturday at 11 pm You can join us for this exciting event. The official website of MischiefTreks has complete details of the Night-Cycling event and also has registration process explained. Q. Can I bring my own cycle for Midnight cycling in Mumbai?  Ans: Yes you can bring your own cycle for the cycling event. Then you can meet us at the starting point and join everyone.Q. Where can I cycle in Mumbai?Ans: You can join Mischief Treks for Night cycling / Midnight cycling in Mumbai. We Ride from Colaba along the Marine Drive mesmerizing queen's necklace all the way to the Gateway of India. The route is planned for you to check out various heritage sites.Q. Is cycle available on rent in Mumbai?Ans: You can join Mischief Treks for Night cycling / Midnight cycling in Mumbai. We ride from Colaba along the Marine Drive mesmerizing queen's necklace all the way to the Gateway of India. The route is planned for you to check out various heritage sites. Cycle renting option for Mumbai cycling is also available on the official website of MischiefTreks.Q. Why Cycling is good for your Joints?Ans: You experience less joint stress when compared to other exercises “Cycling is a low-impact exercise”. This means that cycling limits impact stress on weight-bearing joints like your hips knees and feet. Plus the movement helps lubricate the joints which reduces pain and stiffness.Q. Which is the nearest train station to Colaba Market?Ans: The Colaba market is near to Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj Terminus CSMT Train station on the Central line and Harbour line. The travel distance from CSMT to Colaba market is 2.5km by road and takes approximately 15 minutes to reach. The nearest local train station on the Western line is Churchgate station. The travel distance from Churchgate station to Colaba market is 2.0 km by road and takes approximately 11 minutes to reach.  Q. What are the benefits of cycling?Ans: Cycling helps you tune up your heart functioning and gives your lungs enough time to workup its capacity to handle additional requirement of oxygen intake. Apart from health benefits cycling also keeps you in good physical shape and helps you have a confident look that improves your personality. Q. Is cycling shorts for girls comfortable for Night Cycling in Mumbai?Ans: Yes any sports apparel that helps you have flexibility and gives you freedom of moving your limbs is good for night cycling in Mumbai. The padded version of cycling shorts helps provide extra comfort during cycling. Decathlon Flipkart and Amazon have various options available for sale. Customise Mumbai Midnight Cycling Event by Mischief TreksAt Mischief Treks we're all about providing awesome experience to suit your preferences and requirements. Whether it's your preferred date or the number of participants we've got you covered. Our Mumbai Midnight Cycling event can be easily customized to align with your chosen date and the size of your group. Just let us know your preferences and we'll craft an adventure that's perfect for you ensuring a seamless blend of flexibility and fun. Explore the freedom of personalized cycling adventures with us designed to make your journey unforgettable.Click on the link to apply for Customised event:  https://www.mischieftreks.com/customised-private-tours-and-treksInstructionsImportant NoteIMPORTANT NOTE REGARDING CYCLING EVENT: After you make payment and send us participant details KYC details form link will be shared with you on whatsapp it needs to be submitted immediately to avoid any inconvenience. The details need to be shared with us atleast 48 hours prior to event date and time. You need to submit accurate correct and authentic details while registering. Your name phone email needs to be your own. Without this authentic info you will "Not" be allowed to participate in the event and no refunds will be provided in such case.Please do not book this event if you are not physically fit to complete the event OR you do not have a sportsmanship spirit OR you haven't read and understood the details FAQ and terms mentioned on this page. Outdoor activities are based on teamwork and by registering for this event you will be part of a team. We haven't hired any slaves/servants to cater to anyone this is an outdoor sports event wherein every participant is responsible for his/her place in the team. We do not welcome latecomers so please report on time.

description: Mumbai is famously seen as one of the fastest and busiest cities of India. But, one of the lesser-known charms of the city, is to experience it in the night. Explore the beautiful coastline and visit the iconic landmarks, while riding through the Mumbai coastline, starting at Colaba Causeway and ending at Colaba with multiple stops on the way. The route passes by some of the iconic places of Mumbai like Marine Drive, Haji Ali, Worli, Sea-face.Time: Day 1 - 11:00 p.m. to Day 2 - 05:30 a.mGrade Level: MediumDuration: 1 NightDistance: Approx. 22- 25 km.With Cycle: Rs. 775/- per personBring your own cycle: Rs. 299/- per personMeet at Colaba Causeway at 10.30 p.m. Allocation of cycles and a short briefing will take place.The ride will begin and follow the pre-decided route with multiple halts in between.• Colaba Causeway • Marine Drive • Babulnath• Breach Candy• Haji Ali • Worli Seaface U-turn from Worli Seaface  • CSMT • Asiatic Library • Gateway / Taj Hotel • Colaba CausewayThe ride ends at Colaba Causeway.Tour concludes with happy memories Please Note:The midnight cycling event will happen in the rain also. Will not accept any cancellations due to rain. No refund will be provided.Inclusions/ExclusionsCycle Rental (option 1)Juice pack & IcecreamExpertise chargesAll taxes applicableTransport till Colaba and backAll kinds of Extra Meals / Drinks OrderedInsurance, tips, Porters, bottled mineral water, aerated drinks etc.Any kind of personal expensesAny kind of cost, which is not mentioned in the above cost includesAll expenses incurred due to unforeseen and unavoidable circumstances like road blocks, bad weatherAny medical / Emergency evacuations if requiredThings to CarryID Card (Compulsory)Face maskHand sanitizerWear light and comfortable clothing that is suitable for cycling.Extra t-shirtWater 2 liters minFood - SnacksPersonal medicines if anyElectoral powder / Glucon DCamera (optional)Rucksack to carry everythingSturdy sports shoes. 75% refund if notified via phone conversation 8 or more days prior to the event date.50 % refund if notified via phone conversation 4 to 7 days prior to the event date.No refund if the cancellation requested is less than 3 days prior to the event date No show No Refund.Event Tickets cannot be transferred to another date against cancellation.Event Tickets cannot be transferred to another person against cancellation.If the event gets canceled we will refund "Trek Amount" only.If the event is canceled due to any natural calamity, political unrest or other such reasons beyond our control the same cancellation policy will apply.FAQFrequently Asked QuestionsEvent DisclaimerTreks and Trails India Rules1. Smoking and drinking alcohol is strictly prohibited. Trek leader’s decision will be final and binding.2. Treks and Trails reserves all the right to change/deviate/cancel the plans without prior notice.3. Telephonic confirmation is mandatory, if unable to contact send us a text message.4. Please avoid wearing Gold and other jewellery (at your own risk) Yes we have many routes across Mumbai, Mumbai suburbs like Vasai Heritage Tour, Sewri Mudflats Tour, Borivali National Park to Aksa Beach Ride and many more for custom cycling events in Mumbai email us highfive@treksandtrails.org. For upcoming cycling events in Mumbai join our whatsapp group. 2. Cycling groups in Mumbai ?At Treks and Trails India we help you connect with fellow cyclist on our events you can join different cycling events and continue with your cycling groups in Mumbai 3. Midnight cycling Mumbai can i bring my own cycle?Yes you can bring your own cycle in good condition for the event, pricing is different for cyclist who bring own cycle. You can meet us at the starting point. 4. Do you conduct Mumbai Cycling on weekdays?On weekdays we conduct private batches for Mumbai Cycling incase you have a group or would like to go for cycling we can quote you please email us highfive@treksandtrails.org 5. Is Cycling in Mumbai available during the Monsoon season?Yes we conduct Cycling in Mumbai through out the year on weekends, we also conduct customised cycling tours in Mumbai for corporates, gyms, influencers and more kindly email us for more details highfive@treksandtrails.org 6. How to receive updates about regular Mumbai Cycling events?You can join our whatsapp group, email list, follow us on Instagram for regular Mumbai cycling events updates please whatsapp us 8828004949 to join our whatsapp group. 7. Cycling routes in Mumbai conducted by Treks and Trails India? Kindly click on the URL for the different cycling routes in Mumbai. Here is the list for cycling events in Mumbai 2021.8. What is included in Night cycling in Mumbai?We will provide you with Cycle without gear, Refreshment during the ride, Guide. We follow the best cycling routes in Mumbai our guides help you navigate.

description: Join Kya Bolte Hyderabad for an open mic happening on 29 June '24, Saturday at our venue Redbrick Offices, Maximus Hyderabad!Hosted by our favorite host Thanughna and Neha !Kya Bolte Hyderabad is an initiative by Kasa Kai Mumbai. Kasa Kai Mumbai is a community building organization where we do events around hobbies & interests of people. We give you a platform where you can express yourself with your interests. Our open mics are suitable spaces for you to perform and lay out your thoughts for audiences.We remove barriers around language, gender and age to bring people together for a night of performances where everyone learns and grows.And with our supportive audience, you have more reasons to show up each week and perform to your heart’s content.This open mic night will provide you with an opportunity to showcase your work and talents with unwavering support for your efforts.Things to keep in mind:- The stage is open for all forms of performative arts: Singing, Comedy, Storytelling, Poetry, etc.- You will get 6 minutes to perform on stage.- You own all rights to your work and performance; Kasa Kai Mumbai holds the right to photograph or shoot the performance for global sharing via social media sites, blog posts and video sharing platforms.- You are required to reach the event 20 minutes before the event starts and check-in with the organizer at the venue.- Your content/performance may not include racist, sexist, homophobic, religious or political remarks which can be sensitive, hurtful or wrongfully provoking.We hope you adhere to these rules and join us at our open mics to perform. See you there!For questions, updates and events in your city call us on 7738681615, follow us on Instagram: @kasa_kai_mumbai & @openmicsbykasakai
location: VenueRedbrick Offices - Maximus 2ALevel 07, Maximus 2A, HUDA Techno Enclave, HITEC City, Hyderabad, Telangana 500081, India

description: Join Kasa Kai Pune for our open mic happening on 29th June 2024 at our venue Redbrick Offices, Shivaji Nagar, Pune!Hosted by our favorite host & dost Prachi !Kasa Kai Pune is an initiative by Kasa Kai Mumbai - which is a community building organization where we do events around hobbies & interests of people. We give you a platform where you can express yourself with your interests. Our open mics are suitable spaces for you to perform and lay out your thoughts for audiences.We remove barriers around language, gender and age to bring people together for a night of performances where everyone learns and grows.And with our supportive audience, you have more reasons to show up each week and perform to your heart’s content.This open mic night will provide you with an opportunity to showcase your work and talents with unwavering support for your efforts.Things to keep in mind:​The stage is open for all forms of performative arts: Singing, Comedy, Storytelling, Poetry, etc.​- You will get 5 minutes to perform on stage.​- You own all rights to your work and performance; Kasa Kai Mumbai holds the right to photograph or shoot the performance for global sharing via social media sites, blog posts and video sharing platforms.​- You are required to reach the event 20 minutes before the event starts and check-in with the organizer at the venue.​- Your content/performance may not include racist, sexist, homophobic, religious or political remarks which can be sensitive, hurtful or wrongfully provoking.We hope you adhere to these rules and join us at our open mics to perform. See you there!For questions, updates and events in your city call us on 7738681615, follow us on Instagram: @kasa_kai_mumbai & @openmicsbykasakai

description:
*Fire-flies camping and Trek for all age group*
Thokarwadi lake side
Batch 1: 25-26 May
Batch 2: 01-02 Jun
Batch 3: 08-15 Jun
Batch 4: 15-16 Jun
Batch 5: 22-23 Jun

*Just 45 km from Wakad*
*60km from Pune*
*70km from Katraj*

Call/WhatsApp
84462 70950 / 72762 18677 / 7276 2727 22 / 78289 97553

About:
Western ghat(Sahyadri) is blessed with lots of flora and fauna.
Fireflies(Jugunu/Kajawa) is one the major attraction among them because of limited presence for around 45 days.
Thokarwadi lake area is the nearest place to see Millions of fireflies.

*Place:* Kiwale Thokarwadi lake side camping
Difficulty Level: Very Easy
 https://www.facebook.com/events/997555815332969/
 https://www.facebook.com/NisargPremiTrekkers/
 https://www.townscript.com/o/nisarg-premi-trekkers-001034/upcoming-events

*Transport mode: Self drive*

*Check in* Sat 4 pm
*Check out* Sun 11 am

*Package cost:* 1300 /-
800/- for 6 to 10 years

*Fees Includes-*
* Refreshment(evening snacks)🌮- Pakode & tea  ☕
* 1 Dinner (veg/nonveg)  (Unlimited)
* 1 Breakfast - pohe & Tea
* Shared tent stay ⛺ with rain protection
* Bonfire 🔥 
* Music
* Trekking Guidance
* First aid kit 

*Activities available at campsite*:
* Cricket 
* Archery 🏹
* D'art 🎯
* Volleyball  🏐
* Badminton 🏸
* Chess ♟️
* Carrom 
* Swimming 
* Trek

Fees doesn't Includes
* Lunch
* Package drinking water
* Extra snacks/tea/lunch orders
* Any luxurious facilities
* Anything not mentioned in includes

Last date for Nominations:
1 Day before event date

*Tentative Plan details:*
Day 1  Saturday
16:00 : Reach camp site, you can early or late as well 
16:00 : Introduction & Instruction for all day activity
17:00 : Tent Allocation & Enjoy camp site activities
18:00 : Evening Tea and refreshment
20:00 : Dinner time
21:00 : Will go for fireflies sighting(Small drive from campsite)
23:30 : Retire for the day/rest

Day 2 Sunday
07:00 : Wake-up call, get fresh.
07:30 : Breakfast and tea
08:30 : Enjoy lake, Swimming with life jacket (small walk to reach)
10:30 : Start back to Pune, Now you are free to fly anywhere

*Registration Process*
1. Transfer the payment on given account number *OR* UPI transfer
2. Share the payment reference number
3. Will share the registration link
4. Complete the registration with your payment reference number (Transaction ID/ UPI Reference ID).
5. Read & accept the NPT disclosure 
-----------------------------------
*Payment Options:*
Google pay/ Phone pe/BHIM UPI at 8446270950@ybl 8446270950@okhdfcbank
-------------------------------- 
*Mandatory instructions for fireflies event:*
1. Keep min 50 feet distance.
2. Don't touch the fireflies and trees/Branches as well.
3. Turn off all electrical devices.
4. Switch off mobile or keep Airplane mode on.
5. Avoid torch or use it with green colour filter only for route.
6. Zero noise(no music/keep silent).
7. Keep all vehicles at min 100 meter distance. Walk/trek for fireflies scene.
8. Smoking/Alcohol/Deo/Perfume all are strictly prohibited.
--------------------------------
*Special instructions for trek event:*
* No crackers within nature.
* Plan may cancel at any time in case of high alert/unwanted weather/group size is below 6.
* Age limit 16 to 45 years.(not applicable for camping event)
* Age relaxation will be decided by organizers.
* Organizers are not responsible for participants vehicle parking anywhere.
* Speaker, Alcohol and smoking is strictly prohibited throughout the event if in forest public area.
* For cancellation please drop an email to TmlzYXJnUHJlbWlUcmVra2VycyB8IGdtYWlsICEgY29t with name and cancellation reason.
* Plan may change as per weather condition.
* Full plan details will be shared with nominated participants only.
* Limited Discounts available for students only.
* Snacks can be Poha, upma, Maggie or any other item's depending on the situation.
* Lunch/Dinner may be packed or limited Thali(Bhaji/Bhakari/Pithala/Rice/Dal/Batata/Khichadi/Pulav) as per availability and situation if it's in inclusion.
* All the food items are limited and you need to pay for extra orders.
* Please do not expect hotel/home kind of food service in trekking events.
* Remember we are not organizing picnic.
* Group size may vary from 5 to 100.
* Private transport means(jeep, tamtam, car, LUV, SUV, Mini Bus, Bus).
* Door to door pickup and drop is an extra facility by organizers and we are only responsible for first pickup and last drop (eg. Pune to Pune)
* Our events are available at different sites and forums. However we consider our Facebook event as updated and authenticated post.
* In any case Organizer's decision will be final.
* Nisarg Premi Trekkers is not responsible for any incident/accident if any participant is not following the guidelines or beyond our control.

#Night_Trek #camping #tent_Stay #fun_And_Games #FireFlies_Trail_Photography
#Photography #fluorescent_green_nature #nature_lovers #trekking
#Beauty_of_Sahyadri #night_photography #chasing_fireflies
#Jungle_walk #western_ghat #NisargPremiTrekkers
#Thokarwadi #forest #Kajawa #Lakeside #PlacestovisitNearPune #Offbeat

Cancellation & other terms and conditions:
 https://docs.google.com/document/d/1HMlY5sHqezsw0FVLSIq0gwPfsJXQdzHEEuOpHxQfbV4/edit?usp=sharing

For more details, WhatsApp/Call us:
84462 70950 / 72762 18677 / 7276 2727 22 / 78289 97553

Feel the beauty of nature with Nisarg Premi Trekkers
location: Pune city, Oya Kekars, Shop 7, Royal Tranqile, Kokane Chowk, Pimple Saudagar, Pimple Saudagar, Pune Sardar Abasaheb Mujumdar Path, Kasba Peth, Pune 411011, India,Pune, Maharashtra

description: Outdoor adventure activity and camping hub, located in Kanva lake backwaters, Ramanagar. It has got, all the three types of activities you can enjoy here.1. Land Activities 2. Water Activities 3. Air Activities.Once you enter the premises you will feel as you have entered the lap of mother nature. Kanva lake area is around 1920 acres, and 15 km long built-in 1946. It is trusted to be Asia’s first automatic open and close gate dam constructed by Sir M Visveswaraya during his ruling era as 19th Diwan of Mysore. Sir Mokshagundam Visveswaraya, whose birthday i.e. 15th September is celebrated as Engineer’s day in India. His purpose of constructing Kanva Dam was to help the farmers for irrigation, and now it is one of the very popular Tourism destinations near Bangalore, in Karnataka.The property is involving in Day Outing, Corporate Team Outing, Institutional Outings, Family Outing, Birthday Parties, Bachelor Parties, Overnight Stays, and more. We have facilities to accommodate 500 plus at a time.  Variant 01 - Dinner, Breakfast, Stay & ActivitiesCheck in : 03 PM to Checkout : 11 AMVariant 02 - Lunch, Dinner, Breakfast, Stay & ActivitiesCheck in : 12 PM to Checkout : 11 AMIncludesItinerary Day 01Day 02Things to carry Organizer DetailsFor queries about this event contact the organizer E2e 9886421211.Terms & Condition

description:
Discover a weekend of self-discovery and rejuvenation
You're exclusively invited to a transformative OSHO Meditation Retreat, carefully crafted for selected participants like you. Amidst the serene ambiance and under the guidance of seasoned facilitators, delve into a series of OSHO Active Meditations that address our modern-day challenges.
Experience the profound impact of these OSHO Meditations:
1. Dynamic Meditation: Unleash increased energy, stress relief, and emotional equilibrium through dynamic movement and moments of serene introspection. Boost both mental clarity and physical vitality.
2. Kundalini Meditation: Awaken your inner vitality, diminish anxiety, and cultivate inner peace with rhythmic movements and mindful breathing. Benefit from reduced stress and improved physical well-being.
3. Nadabrahma Meditation: Harmonize body and mind, amplify creativity, and achieve mental clarity through gentle hums and tranquil stillness. Experience enhanced mental focus and a more balanced physical state.
4. OSHO Nataraj Meditation: Find inner freedom, emotional balance, and self-expression through a fusion of dance, music, and tranquility. Rejuvenate both mind and body, promoting overall wellness.
5. OSHO No-Mind Meditation: Liberate your mind from clutter, emotional baggage, and embrace relaxation, clarity, and heightened consciousness. Reap the rewards of reduced mental chatter and improved physical well-being.
Participating in these meditations fosters mental clarity, emotional balance, and spiritual awakening, while significantly contributing to physical well-being. Moreover, these weekend retreats are mostly free or supported by participants themselves, making this an accessible and enriching opportunity.
Embrace this chance to explore these profound practices firsthand at the ZEN ESSENCE (OSHO SHIVAGANGE). Join us in rediscovering inner peace and embarking on an illuminating journey towa3732/-ou to get the sweetest experience of OSHO meditations.
How to pay: Phonepe/gpay/paytm to 9980562847**
We have limited seats, get confirmation of your seat by paying in advance

description:
Water, sand, waves…. what more can you ask for?? All this on a secluded place with no stalls, no shacks, no commercial aspects…absolutely nothing. Yes, there is a place like this where you get to feel the ocean speak to you without any other noise. If you love trekking, especially along the mesmerizing beaches then come and join us to explore this lone Arabian beauty and Gokarna town. Ditch your city predicaments and calm yourself in the soothing sound of rising and falling waves, the feel of soft sand and warmth of sun tingling your skin at five beautiful beaches of Gokarna. Experience the breathtaking sunset, Camping with soulful people sleeping under the naked sky with billions of stars staring at you and embrace this rejuvenating experience.
Book now:- https://adventuresome.in/explore/gokarna-beach-trek

description:
Kindly mention all the details asked during joining the waitlist.
Difficulty level: Easy
Who can join our Group???
●This group is only for adventure lovers.
●Fit to survive all weather conditions are welcome.
●Travel enthusiasm is needed.
●Flexible with change in the plan if things are out of control.
●One who is fit and can carry their backpack and also a tent (if required)
●No Luxury expectations
●Come with an adventurous spirit. No touristy expectations, please!!
●If the ticket doesn't get confirmed after the chart preparation, we'll be booking a bus ticket and the difference amount will be collected.
●We try our best to confirm tickets. If train tickets are in RAC have to adjust with another co-passenger
●Don’t expect washroom availability.
●One should come out of their comfort zone to join our group.
Clear your doubts before confirming the slot
Tentative Itinerary
Day 1:
08.00 PM: Will start on the train from Hyderabad. The train halts at Nampally, Begumpet, and Lingampally
Day 2 :
09:30 AM: Reach Pune, Get into a private vehicle
12.30 PM: Reach base village & Lunch
01:00 PM: Start Secret Waterfall trek
08:00 PM: Dinner
09.00 PM: We will have all the fun we can have
Day 3:
04:00 AM: Wake Up Call
04:30 AM: Trek to Devkund Waterfall
11:30 AM: Start to Pune
04:30 PM: Start to Hyderabad by train
Day 4:
06:00 AM: Reach Hyderabad
Inclusions:

Transportation: Hyderabad - Hyderabad by sleeper coach train
Local transportation
Stay
Life Jacket
Food: 1 Dinner & Breakfast
Entries & Permits
Experienced Trek Lead and local guide
First-Aid Assistance

Price: 4699/-
Note: Due to less availability of sleeper class coaches, we book 3rd AC Coach or Sleeper Class Bus Tickets, and the difference amount will be collected
Reserve your spot by paying a non-refundable advance amount of INR 2000/-
For More Details Contact:
Edge Adventures: 9966119844
WhatsApp:
https://wa.me/message/YCSGJCSZJDAPN1
Insta: https://instagram.com/edgeadventures.in
Exclusions:
●Food that is not mentioned in Inclusions
● Any Personal Expenses
●Expenses incurred because of any natural/manmade uncertainties
Things To Bring for Monsoon Trek:
● Backpack with Rain cover (30L-40L)
● Extra two Pair of clothes (Dry-fit preferably)
●Keep All things in Separate covers. then put it in a bag
● Mobile Cover
● Raincoat/Poncho
●Dry packs/covers to Put your wet clothes
Trekking Gear:
●Trekking Shoe with Good Grip
● Head Torch (Extra Batteries)
●Trekking Pole (Optional)
● Cap
● Water bottle
● Extra Pair of Socks
● Toiletries
● Personal medication
● 2 emergencies note with your name, address, and emergency contact number.
● Loads of energy.
Things to Remember:
● Smoking and consumption of alcohol are prohibited.
● Separate accommodation for Male and Female participants.
● No littering
● It's not a luxury trip. Be prepared to push your limits.
● If required Everyone has to carry equipment, tent, and mats along with them throughout the trek. (Return them after the event)
● Event Hosts have all the rights to add or remove any member and do necessary changes in route, activity, time, and duration depending on the strong composition of the team and weather conditions.
● Edge Adventures Club will reserve the right to cancel the trip or your participation in the trip if the agreement is violated. Let's be responsible travelers.
● In case of unforeseen weather conditions or government restrictions, certain activities may be canceled and in such cases, the operator will try his best to provide an alternate feasible activity. However, no refund will be provided for the same.
● Your seat might be in RAC, WL, or confirmed depending on the date you've paid the advance. If your ticket doesn't get confirmed after the chart preparation, we'll be booking a bus ticket and the difference amount will be collected. If train tickets are in RAC have to adjust with another co-passenger.
Guidelines: we strictly follow -the leave-no-trace policy (even if it’s a banana peel / or an orange peel) no trace should be left.
We try to make the travel arrangements as perfectly as possible but it doesn't happen every time and we have to seek an immediate alternate mode of transport, if you are a person who doesn't like to adjust, we suggest you not RSVP
TRANSPORTATION BOOKING CLAUSE:
● Please book your slots for the event at least 45 days before the start date to have a peaceful journey on the Train without a Waitlist or RAC travel
● This is important because railway tickets may not be available closer to the event date, and booking at the last minute may result in additional costs for Tatkal tickets. To avoid these issues and ensure your participation in the event, please book your slots well in advance.
P.S.- Trek will begin if there are more than 6 attendants.

description:
Happymates presents one of the most exciting trips of the year to the Official “Oppa”Land – South Korea! Whether you are a diehard K Drama/K Pop fan or not, you would surely not want to miss this one.
· Explore Seoul's vibrant soul: From historic palaces to buzzing street markets, be part of the K-drama magic!
· Visit K Drama Locations: Visit all the famous K Drama locations and hope to meet your Oppa on the streets somewhere.
· Indulge in culinary delights: Savor mouthwatering bibimbap, kimchi, and other local specialties - your taste buds will thank you! It is a non-vegetarians paradise.
· Embrace K-pop culture: Experience the energy of live music, trendy cafes, and the heart of Korean pop culture.
· Shopping: Indulge in best cosmetic shopping as Korea is known for its skin care.
· Make unforgettable memories: From exploring hidden gems to connecting with fellow travelers, this trip will be one for the books!
Detailed Itinerary: http://tinyurl.com/HMSkorea
For more details call on 9920321224.
You can make an initial deposit of 20,000/- on 9920321224 and reserve your spot. We have limited slots for this trip so pls hurry and secure your spot first.
Cost: 1,35,000/- (Early bird discount price of 1,25,000/- for first 5 travelers)
Trip Snapshot: 11days-10 nights
· 5 Days in Seoul
· 2 Days in Busan
· 3 Days in Jeju Island
Inclusions:
· Stay in Hotels/Homestays for 10 days
· Breakfast on all 10 days
· Accommodation on twin sharing basis
· All internal transport within the trip
· Entry to Gyeongbokgung palace and Bukchon Hanok Village
· Permits to enter Nami Island and Jeju Island
Excludes:
· Mumbai to Seoul and Jeju to Mumbai flight tickets
· Train to Busan and Flight from Busan to Jeju
· Visa Fees
· Lunches/Dinners
· Tips

We at Thrill Zone are committed to the cause of healthy living catering to running fraternity to promote Running Culture. Completed its 105 events; Thrill Zone has organized half marathons all over India, hence works Pan India.Organized By - Thrill ZoneEvent - Punjab Half Marathon 2024 (14th edition)Date - 10th Nov 2024Venue - Chandigarh Club Sector 1 Near CM HouseDistance - 21km (Timed Run), 10 km (Timed Run), 5 km-T(Timed Run), 3km-Fun runFor Participants - 21km (Timed Run), 10 km (Timed Run), 5 km(Timed Run) - T-shirt, Medal, certificate, refreshments, Hydration support, Energy drink3km fun run- Medal, certificate, refreshments, Hydration support, Energy drinkCut-off Timings for all distances 21 KM (Timed Run)- 3:30 Hours.10 KM (Timed Run) - 2:00 Hours. 5 KM (Timed Run), 5k & 3k fun run - 1 Hour.Age Category:-21 KM (Male/Female)18 to 30 Years31 to 40 Years41 to 50 Years51 to 60 Years61+ 70 Years 71+ Years 10 KM - Age categoriesUnder 18 Years19 to 40 Years41 to 50 Years51 to 60 Years61+ 70 Years71+ Years 5 KM -Timed Run - Top 3 male and 3 female (Open to all)3 KM - Fun Run RewardsNo Cash Prizes: There are no cash prizes for any distance.Trophies for top 3 fasteset males and 3 females: Trophies will be awarded only to the fastest 3 males and top 3 females in the 5km (Timed Run), 10km and 21km distances.Age Category Winners Announcement: Winners in age categories will be announced online within 2 days after the event, following results verification.No Trophies for Age Categories: There will be no trophies for age category winners; the announcement will be made online on social media and the event website.Points to remember:-To get customized BIB register at least 15 days prior to the event date.Registration with a discount is not transferable, registrations are transferable 15 days prior to the event if the amount is paid without a discount.BIB Expo will be on 1 day prior to the event at Venue only, there is no BIB Expo on event day.If anyone is collecting other's bibs he/she should have a consent letter along with a ticket from the participants then only we will hand over the BIB.There is no on-spot registration.Exchange: Participants are not allowed to exchange their Timing BIBs with other participants. The BIB number assigned to each participant is unique and must be used only by that participant only, if anyone is found putting on another's bib he/she will be disqualified from the event.Put on BIB on Chest, it should be visible, if anyone is found with BIB on the back he/she will be disqualified from the winner's list.All the updates related to the event will be shared on the registered email id.Only registered participants are allowed to enter the venue.The timing certificate and timing will be available on the same day, timing message will be sent to a registered number.All photos will be available within 24 Hr a few albums will be available on the same day on Facebook Thrill Zone Page.Facilities while the event:-Baggage Counter at the venue.Ambulance on the route.Physio and medical team at Venue and on Route at multiple points.Hydration point at every 1-2 km.Washroom at Start/Finish and on routeTiming System at Start/Finish, 5km and 10.5km (For timed runners 21k & 10K), for 5km runner timing point at start/finish.Route Marking: The route will be marked with arrows and other markers to guide participants on the correct path during the half marathon.Pre-Event Zumba and post-run cooldown session for runners by Zumba instructors. Route marshals will be there at all distances to guide the route.Volunteers will be en route to guide runners and at Hydration points. The medal will be given to all the participants post-completion of the run.For any queries mail us at - Y29udGFjdCB8IHRocmlsbHpvbmUgISBpbg==For Query call us at 8287856072, 8630446801WAIVER & RELEASE FROM LIABILITYI know that running or volunteering for a road race is potentially hazardous activity, which could cause injury or death. I will not enter and participate unless I am medically able and properly trained, and by my signature, I certify that I am medically able to perform this event, and am in good health, and I am properly trained. I agree to abide by any decision of a race official relative to any aspect of my participation in this event, including the right of any official to deny or suspend my participation for any reason whatsoever. I attest that I have read the rules of the race and agree to abide by them. I assume all risks associated with running in this event, including but no limited to: falls, contact with other participants, the effects of the weather, including high heat and/or humidity, traffic and the conditions of the road , all such risks being known and appreciated by me. The registration fee is not refundable in any condition if discount is more than 20%. I understand that bicycles, skateboards, baby joggers, roller skates or roller blades, animals, and personal music players are not allowed in the race and I will abide by all race rules. Having read this waiver and knowing these facts and inconsideration of your accepting my entry, I, for myself and anyone entitled to act on my behalf, waive and release the Thrill Zone ,the group of Runners of India , all event sponsors, their representatives and successors from all claims or liabilities of any kind arising out of my participation in this event, even though that liability may arise out of negligence or carelessness on the part of the persons named in this waiver. I grant permission to all of the foregoing to use my photographs, motion pictures, recordings or any other record of this event for any race purpose.

description:
The First Monsoon Marathon is here!



Date - 7th July 2024

It's the first race of the Great Monsoon marathon through the most scenic route at the base of Prabalgad Fort. Awesome route, You will run alongside the green mountains and rice fields.

Running through the countryside and through a village always makes for the most interesting audience.

Race Distance 

21 Km - Timed Run 

10 Km - Timed Run 

5 km - Fun Run 

3km -  Fun Run 



All participants get

• T-shirt

• Finisher’s medal

• Timing chip to record finish time on the timing certificate.

• Race day experience of a professionally managed race.

• Breakfast

• Route support

• E-Certificate



For any query mail us at - YnVkZHkgfCBydW5idWRkaWVzICEgY2x1Yg==



For Group Booking and Other queries, Pl reach us at 9372846475



Rules & Regulations:

Once registration is confirmed, the fee is non-refundable.

Please save the confirmation email received after registration as a reference for future communications.

Runners found to have interchanged their running number bib and/or timing bib tag with another individual will be disqualified from the event and shall not be allowed to apply or participate in the subsequent edition of the event.

Please note if you don't wear your timing bib tag as instructed, you won't be able to get an official finish time and thereby the official Certificate recording your finish times.

Further, every runner must wear his/her running number bib on the front of the vest. Any mutilation, fold, alteration, or damage to the bib will amount to the disqualification of the runner from the event.

Organizers reserve the right to stop any participant from participating who is found medically unfit to continue in the opinion of the medical personnel.

Baggage counters are available for all participants. It is strongly recommended that you do not leave valuables like mobile phones, cameras, jewelry, watch, electronic gadgets, etc. in the bag stored. Organizers are not responsible for any loss of baggage and/or its belongings

Participants are requested to cooperate with the police and security personnel deputed at the event venue and on the route. Participants/supporters are liable to random checking on race day – this is for your own security.

Only Participants that register at least 15 days before the event get their names printed on the bib/chest number.

Entry Cancellation: Requests for cancellation & transfer will not be accepted and thereby, a refund will not be entertained.

The right to participate in the event and the rights and benefits available to the applicant under this application form is at the sole discretion of the Event Organizing team and cannot be transferred to any other person under any circumstances, and the applicant alone shall be entitled to the rights and benefits arising hereunder.

The rules listed are subject to change as per the discretion of the Event Heads and the Organizing Committee.

description: 3rd Edition Of #SAVIORTHON10k#SAVIORTHON is a run that stands as a powerful tribute to honor our courageous WARRIORS who amidst grave personal risks devote themselves to safeguarding our nation and tirelessly catering to our needs at every juncture.Objective:Honoring : A marathon dedicated to expressing gratitude to the brave warriors who selflessly serve our nation risking their lives to ensure our safety and meet our needs at every turn. These warriors include healthcare workers municipal staff proud members of the police force army navy as well as individuals from both public and private institutions.Social Cause : SAVIORTHON10K has forged an official partnership with an organization acting as aSocial Welfare Partner to empower NGOs in harnessing fundraising opportunities for their causes.Health & Fitness : This transformative description:
Join us for a rejuvenating 7-day yoga celebration! Yogscape 2024, organized by Upjay Foundation, welcomes everyone to embrace the spirit of yoga from June 15th to June 21st, commemorating International Day of Yoga. This free event aims to unite the community through the practice of yoga in the serene settings of Jaipur’s City Park and Jawahar Circle.

Dates: June 15-21, 2024
Time: 6 AM to 7 AM daily
Locations: City Park & Jawahar Circle, Jaipur
Admission: Free (Registration required)

Event Highlights:

• Daily one-hour yoga sessions led by experienced instructors.
• Ideal for all ages and skill levels.
• Explore different yoga styles and techniques.
• Special sessions focusing on mindfulness and relaxation.

Why Join Us?

• Start your day with positive energy and tranquillity.
• Experience the benefits of yoga in beautiful outdoor settings.
• Connect with fellow yoga enthusiasts in your community.
• Support health and wellness for all, free of charge!

Registration
Secure your spot today by registering through 
 https://yogscape.com/register/

Contact Information:
For more information, please contact us at 8875909900, or visit our website at www.yogscape.com.


Join us in celebrating health, peace, and community.
Let's stretch, strengthen, and relax together at Yogscape 2024!
location: City Park, Mansarovar, Jaipur, India

description:
South Dhobikhana and the old cultural city 
Saturday, June 15, 2024
9am to 12:30pm

Have you ever traced the fascinating story of Calcutta's open air 'dhobikhana' from the times of the colonial rule. 

Have you been to the oldest NGO of the city? Have you been to an old temple of the Malayalees which has a very interesting story to share? Have you walked around the lanes and streets of south Calcutta to rediscover the hidden gems which has volumes to speak? Of Jibananada Das, Satyajit Ray and Mrinal Sen?

Kolkata Explorers (a division of Green Step Tourism) will take you on a guided tour to the southern part of the city. Come and be amazed yourself !

Starting from Maddox Square at 9am. The tour will end at 12:30pm at Triangular Park, Rashbehari Avenue. This will be a totally guided tour by AC Car. Walking will also be involved keeping the car at one particular parking spot. 

IF ANYONE WANTS A PICK UP ON THE ROUTE OF OUR CAR YOU MAY PLEASE INFORM US YOUR CONVENIENT PICK UP POINT. OUR CAR WILL START FROM KAVI SUBHAS METRO AND TAKE THE EM BYPASS TO RUBY CROSSING AND TURN LEFT TOWARDS RASHBEHARI. 

TO REDUCE SINGLE USE PLASTIC USAGE WE REQUEST YOU TO PLEASE CARRY YOUR OWN REUSABLE DRINKING WATER BOTTLE.

TOUR ITINERARY:
1. Refreshments from the street side eateries
2. Tea from the road side stall 

PLACES TO BE COVERED :
1. South Dhobikhana
2. Oldest NGO in Calcutta (where you can pick up handicrafts at a discounted price AT YOUR OWN COST, only now)
3. Lake Temple Road
4. Sree Guruvayurappan Temple 
5. Places of Jibanananda Das, Satyajit Ray and Mrinal Sen connections 

CHARGES ALL INCLUSIVE  RS 1850/- PER HEAD. WE NEED MINIMUM OF 3 GUESTS FOR THIS TOUR TO HAPPEN. 

PAYMENT CAN BE MADE TO:
1. PUNJAB NATIONAL BANK, KOLEY MARKET BRANCH, KOL 700012
ACCOUNT NAME: GREEN STEP EVENT MANAGEMENT
CURRENT ACCOUNT NO. 0075050027681
IFSC: PUNB0007520
OR
2. GPAY/PAYTM TO 9874062962 (Avijit Dhar Chowdhury)

Please leave a message at our Whatsapp number 9874062962 for us to send you our booking confirmation with details
location: Maddox Square, Maddox Square-Durgotsav, Ritchi Road, Ballygunge-Maddox Square, Ballygunge, Kolkata 700029, India,Kolkata

description: Hack4Purpose 2024 is a nationwide entrepreneurial hunt conducted by DPurpose Foundation to encourage direct and champion our youth to innovate for a sustainable planet. We simply wish to tap your potential for purpose and provide you all that is needed to put your innovation into action. The primary focus of the Hackathon series of this year lies on four pillars of innovations in alignment with the 17 Sustainable Development Goals proposed by the United Nations.Eligibility:All engineering and arts college students, MBA students and postgraduates can apply.IIT, NIT, IISc, IIM are NOT eligible to apply.Team can have 2 to 4 members max and.1 female member is compulsory.Colleges have no limit for submission of ideas.Prize:Prize 1 Lakh on spot cash award for top team.Top 100 teams will receive 25 lakh support to convert their idea to product.National sustainability award for top college with highest applications.Special prizes for top 2nd and 3rd Place and E-certificates for all participants. Action Required: Check out our website (click on Register Here button) and simply fill in the new form. Hackathon (hack4purpose.in)Deadline for Registration: Please complete your registration by May 29th, 2024. This will ensure your eligibility for the Hack4Purpose competition and allow you to make your entrepreneurship dreams come true. For any inquiries or further information, please do not hesitate to contact us.Email: support@hack4purpose.in and Whatsapp: +91-7904326057 or call +91-8925902116

description: Tired of playing Ludo, Snakes & Ladders and Monopoly? Don't know how to socialize except around food and drinks. Welcome to the modern tabletop universe! These modern games are highly sophisticated and can have varying levels of complexity and interaction. The defining feature is that they are all super engaging. If you have heard of games like Catan and Power Grid this would be the place to try them out.If you're already into tabletop gaming, come join one of our tables or even Bring Your Own Game. We teach at the table and the event is newbie-friendly. For seasoned gamers, we have heavier games, for which game rules would be coordinated in advance.This is a limited seating event. Game rules are usually taught at the table or coordinated in advance in case of more complex games.Age RecommendationThis event is recommended for players 21 yrs and above. On occasion folks bring in their teenage kids to play. The games however generally are of fairly high complexities and not feasible for people under 16 to enjoy. Since a single table is played at by others also, please respect this limitation as it can affect the enjoyment of other event attendees.F&BFood and drinks can be ordered through food apps. There is a small breakout area for eating and drinking. Please try to keep the food and drinks off the tables on which board games are being played.ParkingParking is available at the event venue. Please Whatsapp at +91 8591485601 to request and coordinate parking.Ticket Pricing"Timely Tabletoppers" ticket price is ₹150. This is available till the afternoon before the event date and cannot be rescheduled however you get to take part in game selection and planning. The "Wallowing Unwinder" ticket is available at ₹250. This is a flexible ticket and you can reschedule your attendance indefinitely. Additionally we refund ₹100 of the Wallowing ticket price against a future event's "Timely Tabletoppers" booking.

description: Synopsis: In a cozy Mumbai cafe, 33-year-old poet Ram reminisces about his past in Allahabad. Flashing back to 2008, he falls for Siya, a fellow student at the 'Chemistry Point' coaching center. Despite his courage, Siya rejects his proposal, leaving him conflicted. Ram reflects on societal pressures and his longing for his village. In the present, he finds closure, realizing that his journey shaped him. The play explores love, longing, and self-discovery against societal expectations.

description:
##### Kinnaur & Spiti Explorer: June 29th to July 7th' 2024
##### OVERVIEW
Kinnaur & Spiti Explorer is an introduction into the landscape, cultures and traditions of the Spitian and Kinnauri people.Located in the western part of Himachal Pardesh, Kinnaur and Lahaul – Spiti districts have borders with China. While Kinnaur is lower in elevation and comprised of Hindus and Buddhists, Spiti Valley is predominantly Buddhist and was a part of present day Tibet in earlier times.
On our way from Shimla we pass through the Kinnaur valley and its meadows, farms and pastures and later high altitude dry mountain desert landscape of Spiti Valley. These less explored lands takes you back in time with the simple yet joyful lives of the people living in these harsh terrains and climate. During the tour we visit temples and monasteries, stay at the highest inhabited villages in the world, camp around Chandratal Lake, drive across and savor the views of the stunning Himalayas, visit high altitude lakes and pass through the high passes of Rohtang La & Kunzum La. This is an offbeat journey through regions that have less exposed to commercial tourism.
Essential Info
Cost: Rs 32500
Country: India
Start: New Delhi
End: New Delhi
Start Date: 29th June’ 2024
End Date: 7th July’ 2024
Duration: 9 Days
Group Size : Min 5 / Max 15
Theme: Culture, Adventure, Experience
Highlights
– Camp at Chandratal Lake
– Beautiful high altitude drives
– Village Homestay at the highest inhabited village of Komic
– Visit the highest post office at Hikkim
– Monastic tours
– Visit Nako, Chandratal and Dhankar lakes
– Visit the meadows and Baspa river at Chitkul
– Experience Kinnauri and Spitian culture and lifestyle
COST : Rs 32500/-
SEE TRIP DETAILS : https://exoticexpeditions.org/kinnaurandspitigrouptrip/
SEE ALL UPCOMING TRIPS:
https://exoticexpeditions.org/upcomingtrips/
CONTACT US :
Santosh Nair
Call/Whatsapp : 9986450370
Email : contact@exoticexpeditions.org

description:
Leh Ladakh Bike ride - 12Nights/13Days
Ex. Hyderabad - Complimentary Train tickets
Highlights:

Manali - Jispa - Sarchu - Gata loops
Leh - Leh Local sightseeings
Nubra valley
Pangong Tso lake
Chandigarh

Itinerary:
Day 1:

Start From Origin City by Train to Delhi .Overnight journey to Delhi.

Day 2:

Reach at bus boarding station in New Delhi, where our assistance will assist you for your further journey to Manali.

Day 3:

Next day morning reach at Manali and get check into hotel and get freshen up.
After refreshment it’s time to gather at hotel lobby for a brief introduction about the upcoming epic adventure journey. Post briefing it is now time to get familiarized with your Machine (The Royal Enfield) as well as mountain traffic. After 01 hr test ride we will return back to hotel.

Day 4:

Wake up call by 06:00am .
After breakfast, begin your adventure to Sarchu by crossing Rohtang-La and Jispa. head over to Sarchu.
Check in to the camp in Sarchu and enjoy night time tea with snacks.
Overnight stay at camps in Sarchu.

Day 5:

A fairytale journey from Sarchu to Leh as today .
Reach Leh by evening.
Overnight stay at a hotel in Leh.

Day 6:

Leh Local sightseeing.

Day 7:

5:00 AM - Wakeup call
On day 5th, the dream come true as today we will start our journey toward Nubra Valley.
Khardungla pass - 18379 Ft , Nubra Valley - Diskit, Hunder.
We will also visit Diskit Gompa and Hunder sand dunes, where you can do a double hump camel safari.
By evening we will reach the camp in Nubra valley.

Day 8:

5:00 AM - Wakeup call
Post-breakfast, we’ll check out from our stay and head towards Pangong Tso.
Over night stay at Pangong Lake.

Day 9:

Pangong Tso , Chang La pass , Leh.

Day 10:

Leh to Jispa .
Over night stay at Jispa.

Day 11:

Jispa to chandigarh. to drop off the bikes.
Reach by evening.
Today is last day of bike trip.
Board the bus and overnight Journey to Delhi.

Day 12:

Reach Delhi by 9am.
Board the train back to Hyderabad by 4pm
Over night journey to Hyd.

Day 13:

Reach Your Home with bag full of memories.

Please click below link to get complete details of Leh ladakh Bike rides.
https://meetovertheweekend.mojo.page/lehladakhhyd
Event Host : Abhishek Reddy G
Contact Number: 9581134100

description:
Hey everyone! 🌧️ It's that time of the year again – our annual Bhandardara trip is just around the corner on July 13th and 14th, and trust me, you don't want to miss out on this one! 🏞️
Remember how much fun we had last year? The laughter, the adventures, and the unforgettable memories we created together? Well, get ready for round two because this year's trip promises to be even more epic!
Bhandardara in monsoon is nothing short of magical – the Umbrella Waterfalls, the mesmerizing Sandhan Valley, and the overall lush greenery create a breathtaking landscape that you have to see to believe. 🌿✨
This is a once-a-year opportunity to escape the hustle and bustle of city life and immerse yourself in nature's beauty. Whether you're a seasoned trekker or just looking for a relaxing getaway, there's something for everyone on this trip.
So mark your calendars, pack your bags, and get ready for an unforgettable 2-day, 1-night adventure in Bhandardara. Trust me, it's a trip you'll be talking about for years to come! Let's make more memories together in this stunning paradise. See you there! 🌈
When: July 13/14
Cost: 4500 (includes travel)
Cost Includes:
A) Stay in MTDC resort in Lake Side Cottage for 2D/1N
B) All travel from Mumbai to Mumbai (as per itinerary) (in Car Pool)
C) Tolls & Road Taxes
D) Breakfast & Snacks & Drinking water bottles

a) Food (Lunches/Dinners)

#BhandardaraBound #MonsoonMagic #UnforgettableAdventures

description:
ABOUT THE PLACE :
Dandeli is an ideal vacation destination in north Karnataka for those who love nature. Dandeli is next adventure destination in India. It offers you lots adventure activities like river rafting in kali river, kayaking, boating, natural Jacuzzi. Not only adventure but the wild life in Dandeli is also very rich. One can also enjoy jungle safari and bird watching trails and jungle walk in the reserved forest. We bring you all these activities together in one trip.
Join us for this ultimate adventure with us!!
The Dandeli forests also play host to the graceful Virnoli Rapids, the magnificent Supa Dam and the sinister Syntheri Rocks, Golden beaches, palm-fringed rivers and sleepy hamlets make up the landscape in Dandeli.
White Water Rafting - There is a choice between a 9-km run that lasts for over four hours and a shorter run that is almost half the other, keeping in mind both seasoned rafters as well as amateurs.
"Please note that Rafting depends upon the water level of river at a particular day. We cannot assure you that rafting will happen on the day we visit"
Tentative Itinerary:
*Total Slots will be 15. Reach us on 7702489748 for availability of slots.
DAY - 1 (Friday)
Catch Train to HUBLI from Kacheguda at 08:15 PM
DAY - 2 (Saturday)


Reach Hubli at 08:30 AM and Have Breakfast


Start to Dandeli by Private Hired Vehicle


Visit Crocodile Park


Reach Dandeli and we will check into Home Stay


Grab some quick lunch at Home Stay.


After having Lunch, Leave for White Water Rafting and Some other water activities (Boating with Kayaking, Jacuzzi Bath) till evening.


Start back to Home Stay at 06:00 PM


Dinner at 08:00 PM


Fun and Games with Bonfire


Sleep


DAY - 3 (Sunday)


Wakeup call at 04:00 AM


Get into private vehicle to cover morning events (Jungle Safari Ride and Syntheri Rocks)


Get back to Home Stay to freshen up and grab breakfast on the way to Sykes Point.


Continue a few more activities and halt for lunch and Start back to Hubli.


Catch the train at 09:00 PM and Reach Hyderabad at 08:00 AM


DAY - 4 (Monday)
And It's time to say Sayonara....
INCLUSIONS:
Transportation :

Hyderabad - Hubli by Train - Sleeper Class
Hubli - Dandeli - Hubli By Private Hired Vehicle
Hubli - Hyderabad by Train - Sleeper Class

Accommodation & Food :

Home Stay
1 Breakfast, 1 Lunch & 1 Dinner

EXCLUSIONS:

description: Join us for an exhilarating night of murder & mystery! Gather your friends and test your wits as you navigate the treacherous waters of trust, betrayal, and strategy. This is your chance to immerse yourself in a world of intrigue, secret identities, and mind-bending tactics.Event Details:- 📅 Date: Saturday, 15th June- ⏱️Time: 8:00pm to 11:30pm- 📍Venue Address:Bombay Board Game Club, 206, Man Excellenza, SV road, Vile Parle West, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400056Whether you're an experienced gamer or a newcomer looking to discover the thrill of social deception games, Blood on The Clocktower Night is the perfect opportunity to connect with like-minded individuals, forge alliances, and outsmart your opponents.Key Highlights:- A limited seating event of BOTC, a social deception game that takes Werewolf, Mafia, and Secret Hitler to the next level.- Co-gamers and storytellers to host, guide, and moderate each game, ensuring a fair and fun experience for everyone.- Refreshments and snacks are available for purchase to keep you fueled for the evening.Kindly note that all guests are requested to assemble by 7:45 so that the game can begin by 8:00 sharp. Latecomers will not be entertained beyond 8:15 pm.For inquiries and reservations, please contact us at +91 9820002546. We look forward to seeing you there!
